top_stories.title: Singularity Compute launches NVIDIA GPU cluster to supercharge enterprise AI and Web3 workloads
top_stories.description: Singularity Compute, the infrastructure division of AI layer SingularityNET, has announced the launch of its first enterprise-grade NVIDIA GPU cluster. The facility, deployed in Sweden in partnership with sustainable data center operator Conapto, realizes Singularity’s goal of establishing a global hardware backbone for the Artificial Superintelligence (ASI) Alliance. The launch will fortify the infrastructure behind […]
top_stories.author: Kerem Gülen
top_stories.content: Singularity Compute, the infrastructure division of AI layer SingularityNET, has announced the launch of its first enterprise-grade NVIDIA GPU cluster. top_stories.title: Amazon Fires Back at OpenAI and Google with New Nova Models and Nova Forge
top_stories.description: Nova Forge, an open training capability that lets organisations build customised variants of Nova called Novellas. The post Amazon Fires Back at OpenAI and Google with New Nova Models and Nova Forge appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.
top_stories.author: Siddharth Jindal
top_stories.content: Nova Forge, an open training capability that lets organisations build customised variants of Nova called Novellas. The post Amazon Fires Back at OpenAI and Google with New Nova Models and Nova Forge appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Open Sources Reasoning Model for Autonomous Driving at NeurIPS 2025
top_stories.description: NVIDIA, AR1 breaks down scenes step by step, considers possible trajectories and uses contextual data to determine routes. The post NVIDIA Open Sources Reasoning Model for Autonomous Driving at NeurIPS 2025 appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.
top_stories.author: Siddharth Jindal
top_stories.content: NVIDIA, AR1 breaks down scenes step by step, considers possible trajectories and uses contextual data to determine routes. The post NVIDIA Open Sources Reasoning Model for Autonomous Driving at NeurIPS 2025 appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.

top_stories.title: Accelerate generative AI innovation in Canada with Amazon Bedrock cross-Region inference
top_stories.description: We are excited to announce that customers in Canada can now access advanced foundation models including Anthropic's Claude Sonnet 4.5 and Claude Haiku 4.5 on Amazon Bedrock through cross-Region inference (CRIS). This post explores how Canadian organizations can use cross-Region inference profiles from the Canada (Central) Region to access the latest foundation models to accelerate AI initiatives. We will demonstrate how to get started with these new capabilities, provide guidance for migrating...
top_stories.author: Daniel Duplessis
top_stories.content: We are excited to announce that customers in Canada can now access advanced foundation models including Anthropic's Claude Sonnet 4.5 and Claude Haiku 4.5 on Amazon Bedrock through cross-Region inference (CRIS). This post explores how Canadian organizations can use cross-Region inference profiles from the Canada (Central) Region to access the latest foundation models to accelerate AI initiatives. We will demonstrate how to get started with these new capabilities, provide guidance for migrating...

top_stories.title: At NeurIPS, NVIDIA Advances Open Model Development for Digital and Physical AI
top_stories.description: Researchers worldwide rely on open-source technologies as the foundation of their work. To equip the community with the latest advancements in digital and physical AI, NVIDIA is further expanding its collection of open AI models, datasets and tools — with potential applications in virtually every research field. At NeurIPS, one of the world’s top AI Read Article
